DOC.criteria: Subjects men woman race ethnic background age 4565 year . Subjects prehypertensive/hypertensive define rest systolic blood pressure > 130 mmHg < 160 mm Hg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 80 mmHg < 100 mm Hg . All woman study postmenopausal ( least 1 year last menstrual cycle ) receive hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) currently precede 3year period . Lastly , candidate sedentary determine Stanford Physical Activity Questionnaire ( < 35 kcal/wk ) engage program regular physical activity least 1 year prior study . Candidates smoke ( currently past 7 year ) , report lowrisk alcohol consumption define 14 standard drinks/wk 4 standard drinks/day men 7 standard drinks/wk 3 standard drinks/day woman ( standard drink define 12 ounce beer , 5 ounce wine , 1Â½ ounce 80proof distilled spirit ) Potential candidate take cardiovascularacting ( i.e . statin , blood pressure medication aspirin ) medication eligible . Fasting plasma glucose > 126 mg/dL . Potential candidate rest heart rate < 50 beats/minute exclude . Use hormone replacement therapy . In hypertensive subject , seat systolic blood pressure great 160 mmHg seat diastolic blood pressure great 100 mmHg .
